name: Space Wars: Rise Of The Clickers
name_original: Space Wars: Rise Of The Clickers
description:
A game about clicking evil clickers then travelling clicks away to another dimension far..far away..

Destroy all 3 bosses and get the achievements for bonus brownie points!

This game was made for The Winter ClickerJam 2023 in a week.

Controls:

Click your ship to do damage, use damage to upgrade your DPS and your ship for even MORE damage!

19/01/2023 Dev comments:

Tip: Invest in DPS, it might not seem worth it in the start as the ships are cool and you would probably want that but I would recommend it 100% for big damage numbers!

Bug report/Advice: I would recommend playing in full screen as the achievement screen is too large for the WebGL player!

CREDITS: 

As it's just me developing the game, I am currently compiling a large list of asset owners and will update this (promise).

Icons and Monster sprites by https://free-game-assets.itch.io
